3 import rospy
4 from sensor_msgs.msg import LaserScan
5 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist, Point, Pose
6 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
7 from gazebo_msgs.msg import LinkState
8 from tf import transformations
9 import math
10 import actionlib
11 import actionlib.msg
12 import exp_assignment2.msg
13 
14 # robot state variables
15 position_ = Point()
16 pose_ = Pose()
17 yaw_ = 0
18 # machine state
19 state_ = 0
20 # goal
21 desired_position_ = Point()
22 # parameters
23 yaw_precision_ = math.pi / 9 # +/- 20 degree allowed
24 yaw_precision_2_ = math.pi / 90 # +/- 2 degree allowed
25 dist_precision_ = 0.1
26 kp_a = 3.0
27 kp_d = 0.5
28 ub_a = 0.6
29 lb_a = -0.5
30 ub_d = 2.0
31 z_back = 0.25
32 
33 # publisher
34 pub = None
35 pubz = None
36 
37 # action_server
38 act_s = None

43 def clbk_odom(msg):
44  global position_
45  global pose_
46  global yaw_
47 
48  # position
49  position_ = msg.pose.pose.position
50  pose_ = msg.pose.pose
51 
52 
53 def change_state(state):
54  global state_
55  state_ = state
56  print ('State changed to [%s]' % state_)
57 
58 
59 def go_straight_ahead(des_pos):
60  global pub, state_, z_back
61  err_pos = math.sqrt(pow(des_pos.y - position_.y, 2) +
62  pow(des_pos.x - position_.x, 2))
63 
64  if des_pos.z != z_back:
65  link_state_msg = LinkState()
66  link_state_msg.link_name = "ball_link"
67  link_state_msg.pose.position.x = position_.x
68  link_state_msg.pose.position.y = position_.y
69  link_state_msg.pose.position.z = des_pos.z
70  z_back = des_pos.z
71  pubz.publish(link_state_msg)
72 
73  if err_pos > dist_precision_:
74  twist_msg = Twist()
75  twist_msg.linear.x = kp_d * (des_pos.x-position_.x)
76  if twist_msg.linear.x > ub_d:
77  twist_msg.linear.x = ub_d
78  elif twist_msg.linear.x < -ub_d:
79  twist_msg.linear.x = -ub_d
80 
81  twist_msg.linear.y = kp_d * (des_pos.y-position_.y)
82  if twist_msg.linear.y > ub_d:
83  twist_msg.linear.y = ub_d
84  elif twist_msg.linear.y < -ub_d:
85  twist_msg.linear.y = -ub_d
86 
87  pub.publish(twist_msg)
88 
89  else:
90  print ('Position error: [%s]' % err_pos)
91  change_state(1)
92 
93 
94 def done():
95  twist_msg = Twist()
96  twist_msg.linear.x = 0
97  twist_msg.linear.y = 0
98  pub.publish(twist_msg)
99 
100 
101 def planning(goal):
102 
103  global state_, desired_position_
104  global act_s
105 
106  desired_position_.x = goal.target_pose.pose.position.x
107  desired_position_.y = goal.target_pose.pose.position.y
108  desired_position_.z = goal.target_pose.pose.position.z
109 
110  state_ = 0
111  rate = rospy.Rate(20)
112  success = True
113 
114  feedback = exp_assignment2.msg.PlanningFeedback()
115  result = exp_assignment2.msg.PlanningResult()
116 
117  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
118  if act_s.is_preempt_requested():
119  rospy.loginfo('Goal was preempted')
120  act_s.set_preempted()
121  success = False
122  break
123  elif state_ == 0:
124  feedback.stat = "Reaching the goal"
125  feedback.position = pose_
126  act_s.publish_feedback(feedback)
127  go_straight_ahead(desired_position_)
128  elif state_ == 1:
129  feedback.stat = "Target reached!"
130  feedback.position = pose_
131  act_s.publish_feedback(feedback)
132  done()
133  break
134  else:
135  rospy.logerr('Unknown state!')
136 
137  rate.sleep()
138  if success:
139  rospy.loginfo('Goal: Succeeded!')
140  act_s.set_succeeded(result)
141 
142 
143 def main():
144  global pub, active_, act_s, pubz
145  rospy.init_node('go_to_point')
146  pub = rospy.Publisher('cmd_vel', Twist, queue_size=1)
147  pubz = rospy.Publisher('/gazebo/set_link_state', LinkState, queue_size=1)
148  sub_odom = rospy.Subscriber('odom', Odometry, clbk_odom)
149  act_s = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(
150  '/reaching_goal', exp_assignment2.msg.PlanningAction, planning, auto_start=False)
151  act_s.start()
152 
153  rate = rospy.Rate(20)
154 
155  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
156  rate.sleep()
157 
158 
159 if __name__ == '__main__':
160  main()
